title: Senior Systems Engineer
bioHtml:
John is a Senior Systems Engineer with over 8 years of experience designing and maintaining enterprise IT infrastructure. He specializes in cloud architecture, virtualization, and cybersecurity.

When he's not optimizing systems, John enjoys and tinkering with home automation projects. He's passionate about mentoring junior team members and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies.

Fun fact: John has built three home labs from scratch and is always eager to discuss networking protocols over a cup of coffee!
